headline.main: Siemens May Seek Another Alstom Tie-Up

docs.snippet: Pooling together Alstom’s and Siemens’s train-making units can create significant medium-term savings, Olaf Storbeck writes in Reuters Breakingviews....
docs.abstract: Pooling together Alstom’s and Siemens’s train-making units can create significant medium-term savings, Olaf Storbeck writes in Reuters Breakingviews.

headline.print_headline: Harley Creates Buzz With Electric Bike,' Hog' Fans Snort
headline.main: Harley Creates Buzz With Electric Bike,' Hog' Fans Snort

docs.snippet: Howie Barokas had just ridden his Harley-Davidson Ultra Limited on Highway 50 across the searing Nevada desert when he heard about the company's new electric motorcycle....
docs.lead_paragraph: Howie Barokas had just ridden his Harley-Davidson Ultra Limited on Highway 50 across the searing Nevada desert when he heard about the company's new electric motorcycle.

headline.print_headline: House, Senate Begins Compromise Talks on Vets Bill
headline.main: House, Senate Begins Compromise Talks on Vets Bill

docs.snippet: House and Senate negotiators opened compromise talks Tuesday on legislation to expand health care for veterans, and said they hope for quick response to a scandal that has uncovered long wait times, false record-keeping and accusations of criminal...
docs.lead_paragraph: House and Senate negotiators opened compromise talks Tuesday on legislation to expand health care for veterans, and said they hope for quick response to a scandal that has uncovered long wait times, false record-keeping and accusations of criminal activity at the Department of Veterans Affairs.

headline.print_headline: Judge: No-Fly List Violates Constitutional Rights
headline.main: Judge: No-Fly List Violates Constitutional Rights

docs.snippet: The U.S. government offers no adequate method for people to challenge their placement on its no-fly list, a federal judge ruled Tuesday in a case involving 13 Muslims who believe they're on the list....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. government offers no adequate method for people to challenge their placement on its no-fly list, a federal judge ruled Tuesday in a case involving 13 Muslims who believe they're on the list.

headline.print_headline: Study: Recession and Recovery Widen US Wealth Gap
headline.main: Study: Recession and Recovery Widen US Wealth Gap

docs.snippet: The Great Recession and the slow recovery have sharply widened the gap between the wealthiest Americans and everyone else, according to a study that underscores the unevenness of wealth gains since the recession ended....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Great Recession and the slow recovery have sharply widened the gap between the wealthiest Americans and everyone else, according to a study that underscores the unevenness of wealth gains since the recession ended.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Air Force to Resume F-35A Fighter Jet Flights Wednesday
headline.main: U.S. Air Force to Resume F-35A Fighter Jet Flights Wednesday

docs.snippet: The U.S. Air Force said it will resume flights of Lockheed Martin Corp's F-35 A-model fighter jets at a Florida air base on Wednesday, two days after one of the jets caught fire while preparing for takeoff....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Air Force said it will resume flights of Lockheed Martin Corp's F-35 A-model fighter jets at a Florida air base on Wednesday, two days after one of the jets caught fire while preparing for takeoff.

headline.print_headline: Uruguay Beats Italy to Advance; Greece Late Winner
headline.main: Uruguay Beats Italy to Advance; Greece Late Winner

docs.snippet: Underscoring a power shift away from Europe, Uruguay fought — and apparently even bit — its way to a 1-0 victory over Italy Tuesday to move to the World Cup's next round with Costa Rica, which sent England home without a single victory...
docs.lead_paragraph: Underscoring a power shift away from Europe, Uruguay fought — and apparently even bit — its way to a 1-0 victory over Italy Tuesday to move to the World Cup's next round with Costa Rica, which sent England home without a single victory after a goalless draw.

headline.print_headline: Police: No Description of Gunman at Concert Venue
headline.main: Police: No Description of Gunman at Concert Venue

docs.snippet: Investigators haven't been able to develop a description of a gunman who opened fire on an SUV carrying rapper ScHoolboy Q after a concert at the Red Rocks amphitheater near Denver....
docs.lead_paragraph: Investigators haven't been able to develop a description of a gunman who opened fire on an SUV carrying rapper ScHoolboy Q after a concert at the Red Rocks amphitheater near Denver.

headline.print_headline: Uruguay's First Marijuana Club Seeks Recognition
headline.main: Uruguay's First Marijuana Club Seeks Recognition

docs.snippet: A group has taken steps to become the first officially recognized marijuana-growing club in Uruguay, where lawmakers have made their country the world's first national marketplace for legal pot....
docs.lead_paragraph: A group has taken steps to become the first officially recognized marijuana-growing club in Uruguay, where lawmakers have made their country the world's first national marketplace for legal pot.
